thread.title: Milla Jovovich wore a $20 top on the red carpet, and here’s where you can get it!
thread.title_full: Milla Jovovich wore a $20 top on the red carpet, and here’s where you can get it!

author: Ashley Rey
title: Milla Jovovich wore a $20 top on the red carpet, and here’s where you can get it!
text:
Milla Jovovich wore a $20 top on the red carpet, and here’s where you can get it! Model and Resident Evil actress Milla Jovovich sported the cutest to p to her film’s premiere, and we have to have it. The classic black and white blouse can be paired perfectly with almost anything, and costs a whomping $20. It’s so affordable that we’re dying to have one in each and every color. And you’ll never guess where the Hollywood beauty grabbed it from! Two words — Forever 21.
The actress sported the blouse with a sleek black pencil skirt and silver pumps, and looked fierce. We’re dying to get our hands on one too, and unlike many other Hollywood trends, this one is far within our reach.
Milla scored the adorable top from Forever 21 for just $20! Han Myung-Gu/Getty Images And, we’re loving how she accented the monochromatic look with sliver accessories. Han Myung-Gu/Getty Images Oh, but we weren’t lying. You can find the trendy blouse over at Forever 21! forever21.com You buy the blouse over at Forever 21 for just $19.99, here! And it’ll totally be worth every penny. The top can be dressed down with a pair of distressed jeans, or worn like Milla in a dressy way as well. Either way, the affordable find will add a dose of sophistication to each and every outfit.
Thanks to Milla, this fashion look won’t cause us to break the bank.
